item.description:
Spring has sprung! stART on the Street Spring Edition that is... enjoy a spring fling on Sunday, May 22nd from 12 noon - 5 p.m. on North Main Street, Worcester, with over 125 artists and crafters from all over New England, live music, kids activities, a farmers market, specialty food vendors, local organizations and food from local restaurants and caterers.

Celebrate the end of winter at this amazing arts fair. Admission is FREE. WOO Card subscribers can swipe for Double WOO points. WOO Card will be available for purchase at the Worcester Cultural Coalition's table.
item.how_to_find_us: Go out there and have fun!!

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: stART on the Street Spring Edition
